Imperio 0.0.0

Package com.imperio

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ErrorHandler
    Implementations of this class handle errors and warnings which may occur within the Imperio library.
    ImpLogger
    This class handles all of Imperio's internal logging.
    OptionCallback
    This class is used as a container for the callback function used by ImperioApp.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ErrorHandlerException
    This ErrorHandler behaves the same as ErrorHandlerPrint, except that after logging error messages, it throws InternalImperioExceptions.
    ErrorHandlerExit
    This ErrorHandler behaves the same as ErrorHandlerPrint, except that after logging error messages, it terminates the program using the provided ErrorType.code.
    ErrorHandlerNull
    This ErrorHandler silently swallows all errors and warnings.
    ErrorHandlerPrint
    This ErrorHandler prints any errors to System.err and any warnings to System.out.
    ErrorType
    Instances of this class represent a category of errors that may occur.
    ExampleCommand
    Instances of this class represent an example invocation of an application.
    HelpGen
    This class creates and/or prints the help text.
    HelpGenDefault
    This HelpGen builds the application help text in the default manner, roughly imitating a man page.
    ImperioApp
    Instances of this class represent an application and can parse a CLI invocation of the application.
    ImperioAppSpec
    Instances of this class contain all the necessary information to generate an Imperio application instance.
    ImpLoggerNull
    This ImpLogger ignores all log messages.
    ImpLoggerPrint
    This ImpLogger prints all log messages to the console.
    Option
    Instances of this class represent a command-line option and contain all the necessary information for parsing it.
    OptionHelp
    A help option is a special option class used to print the help text.
    OptionIndex
    Instances of this class are used as a unique identifier for any option in a given Imperio app.
    OptionSpec
    Instances of this class contain all the data necessary to generate an Option.
    StringArrContainer
    Simple container class for string arrays.
    UsageGen  
    UsageGenChars
    This class only includes option's long-form name in the usage when the option does not have POSIX characters.
    UsageGenNames
    This class only includes option POSIX characters in the usage when the option does not have a name.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OptionArchetype  
    OptionType
    This class enumerates the possible option types.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ImperioException  
    InternalImperioException
